title: Irwin Naturals Maca Root and Ashwagandha | The Healthy Place
description: Boost Your Sex Drive & Arousal With Irwin Naturals Maca Root And Ashwagandha! The Concentrated Maca Root And Ashwagandha Will Enhance Your Sexual Vitality!
cleaned_text: 9 in stock 75 Liquid Soft-Gels Boost your sex drive and arousal with Irwin Naturals Maca Root and Ashwagandha! The concentrated ingredients will enhance your sexual vitality, starting today!* - Boosts sexual vitality and energy* - Enhances sexual desire and arousal* - Maintains an active sex drive* - No preservatives added Irwin Naturals Maca Root and Ashwagandha We all wish we could perform at our best at all times — especially when it comes to our sex life. Now, you can stay at your best with Irwin Naturals Maca Root and Ashwagandha! With a specialized blend of ingredients designed to have you feeling aroused and energized, this [sexual health supplement](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/mens-health-supplements/mens-sexual-health-supplements/) is your new go-to for spicing things up in the bedroom! Maca root, also called Peruvian ginseng, is an adaptogen, meaning that it helps our bodies adapt to stress. In addition to its "adaptable" health benefits, maca root can help with erectile dysfunction, enhance libido, and increase stamina and energy.* Ashwagandha is another adaptogenic herb, like maca root, which has been used for centuries in traditional herbal medicine. Aside from its relaxing and mood-boosting effects, ashwagandha also promotes healthy testosterone levels and enhances fertility.* As the name suggests, those are the two main ingredients in this [sexual health supplement](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/womens-health-supplements/sexual-health-womens-health/). But when you buy Irwin Naturals Maca Root and Ashwagandha, you get extra nutrients to amp up your sexual arousal!* - Damiana: This was used historically as an aphrodisiac to amplify libido and sexual desire.* - Horny goat weed: Horny goat weed promotes healthy blood flow throughout the body, which can help with erectile dysfunction and enhances sex drive.* - Red ginseng: This is a popular ingredient in sexual health supplements, and for a good reason! Red ginseng can help maintain an erection, as well as keep up stamina and energy.* - Beetroot: Similar to horny goat weed, beetroot stimulates our blood flow, which naturally boosts sexual arousal.* - MCT oil: And just for some added Naturals Maca Root and Ashwagandha also contains MCT oil, which has many benefits, including enhanced athletic performance, healthy blood sugar levels, and weight management.* Plus, Irwin Naturals' special Bioperine Complex improves the bioavailability of these liquid soft gels, so they're and Ashwagandha for question about Irwin Naturals Maca Root and Ashwagandha, or any of our other [men's](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/mens-health-supplements/mens-sexual-health-supplements/) and [women's sexual health supplements](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/womens-health-supplements/sexual-health-womens-health/), but are too embarrassed to ask? Don't be shy — our certified Wellness Consultants are trained to have the answers you need while being discreet about it. Click on the LiveChat button to start a conversation! Suggested Use: (Adult) For daily maintenance, take four (4) Liquid Soft-Gels per day in divided doses, with meals and a full glass (8oz) of water. For a more immediate response prior to intimacy, take four (4) Liquid Soft-Gels one hour before activity. Do not take more than four (4) Liquid Soft-Gels in one day. Cautions: Keep out of the reach of children. This product contains ingredient(s) that may affect blood pressure and/or heart conditions. Consult a physician before using this product and engaging in activity, if you are taking any medications, or have any medical conditions. Do not use if you may become pregnant, are pregnant or nursing. Do not exceed recommended daily intake. Not intended for use by persons under 18. Warning: (State of California Prop 65) This product contains a chemical known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm. Questions? We've got answers! Serving Size: 4 Liquid Soft-Gels Servings Per Container: 18 Ingredients: Sodium, powder (rhizome) water, annatto (color), soy lecithin, St. John's bread (carob) (color), silicon dioxide, titanium dioxide (color) and maltodextrin Contains: Soy, Tree Nuts (coconut, palm kernel) The mission is simple: heal the world with plant medicine. In 1994, Klee Irwin had a vision to accomplish that mission, so he founded Irwin Naturals. Instead of funneling his money into marketing or advertising, he decided to invest his sparse savings into potent supplements. The result? Over the decades, customers noticed that spending their money on these incredible supplements had a profound impact on their health! What started as a small following has expanded to millions of loyal fans, allowing Klee to accomplish his mission one person at a time through the power of plants. Plants are naturally rich in vitamins, minerals, and botanical ingredients that contribute to a healthy diet and lifestyle. No matter your health conditions, Irwin Naturals trusts that plants can heal and revitalize your mind and body! Since the 1990s, Irwin Naturals continues to produce high-quality supplements that are affordable, absorbable, and potent. But here's what really sets them apart from the competition: all of their products are in the form of liquid soft gels! Traditional tablets and capsules sometimes include filler ingredients and are often difficult for our bodies to absorb. That's not the case with Irwin Naturals soft gels! Each one contains BioPerine Complex, a black pepper extract with added ginger that boosts absorption. On top of easy-to-digest soft gels, you can trust the quality standards of all Irwin Natural products. Besides being completed in the USA, all supplements are tested for quality, compliance, and regulations. In fact, they only utilize hemp grown in the United States! Ready to heal your body with plant medicine?
